scripts.mcp-cli: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/list
scripts.mcp-tools-list: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/list
scripts.mcp-tool-activity_list_metrics: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/call --tool-name activity_list_metrics --arguments "{}"
scripts.mcp-tool-activity_query: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/call --tool-name activity_query --arguments "{\"metric\":\"Зарядка\",\"range\":\"last 7d\"}"
scripts.mcp-tool-activity_aggregate: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/call --tool-name activity_aggregate --arguments "{\"metric\":\"Зарядка\",\"range\":\"last 30d\",\"agg\":\"mean\"}"
scripts.mcp-tool-activity_add: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/call --tool-name activity_add --arguments "{\"metric\":\"Зарядка\",\"value\":\"1\"}"
